categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The MC75 Ordnance Cruiser was a variant of the MC75 Star Cruiser produced by Mon Calamari Shipyards. After the subjugation of Mon Cala, these vessels were the first wave of city-ships to escape as part of the Mon Calamari Exodus Fleet, and integrated into the Alliance Fleet of the Rebel Alliance.
